dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A dataset constructed from the real-world tour scenario of Fliggy, including more than 60,000 POIs, 354 unique tags, and more than 190,000 POI-tag pairs. It contains related textual contexts and images for each POI.
dcterms:title: MPTD1 (Multi-modal POI Tagging Dataset)

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A more concise dataset constructed from MPTD1, containing a subset of POIs with texts and images that are semantically related to their gold tags, aimed at improving model training efficiency.
dcterms:title: MPTD2
